title: Statius Thebaid 9 - we learn in lines 12-13

content.question: In lines 12-13 (Dic . . . quievi), we learn that

choices.label: the mother deserves to see her son punished
the soldier’s mother opposed his leaving for war
the soldier blames his mother for his punishment
the soldier did not want to leave his mother and take up arms

content.answer: the soldier’s mother opposed his leaving for war
